original: 稟告主公，軍營外頭有位<color=#b6f8f4>說書人</color>來訪！想對主公說說<color=#bceea7>溫酒斬華雄</color>的故事，亦或是主公只想看看精彩的影片呢？
text: Tell the lord, there is a <color=#b6f8f4>storyteller</color> outside the barracks! Want to tell the lord the story of <color=#bceea7>Wenjiu cut Huaxiong</color>, or the lord just want to watch wonderful videos?
